info.description: This will be a free to use, open sourced questions database which has a REST API implemented in Python3 & Flask using PostgresSQL database, also this will be a source for a minimal quizzing website which will also let contributors add new questions in multiple categories and as MCQ or T/F types.This will be a free to use, open sourced questions database which has a REST API implemented in Python3 & Flask using PostgresSQL database, also this will be a source for a minimal quizzing website which will also let contributors add new questions in multiple categories and as MCQ or T/F types.
info.title: questionnaire-api
